name: Digita Oy
goal: Digita broadcasts radio and TV programs reliably to all of Finland, every day of the year. Applying cutting-edge digital technology, we also develop and supply versatile Internet TV and radio services along with services based on our comprehensive network infrastructure. Our clients are media houses and mobile and broadband operators that provide the very best contents. Digita providers also IoT and Data Center services. Digita employs approximately 170 professionals.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Information Society, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: Information Society, Competition, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Electronic Communication, Data Privacy, GDPR
